name: tsbi4
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: sylib(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wb(w1, w2))), wo(wo(w2, wn(w1)), wn(wb(w2, w1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wi(w0, wo(wo(w2, wn(w1)), wn(wb(w2, w1))))
-| wb(wo(wo(w2, wn(w1)), wn(wb(w2, w1))), wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wb(w1, w2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wi(w0, wo(wo(w2, wn(w1)), wn(wb(w2, w1))))
-| wb(wo(wo(w2, wn(w1)), wn(wb(w2, w1))), wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wb(w1, w2))))

|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wo(wo(w2, wn(w1)), wn(wb(w2, w1))), wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wb(w1, w2))))

stmt.origin: orbi12i(wo(w2, wn(w1)), wn(wb(w2, w1)), wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wb(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(wo(w2, wn(w1)), wn(wb(w2, w1))), wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wo(w2, wn(w1)), wo(wn(w1), w2))
-| wb(wn(wb(w2, w1)), wn(wb(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wo(w2, wn(w1)), wo(wn(w1), w2))
-| wb(wn(wb(w2, w1)), wn(wb(w1, w2)))

|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wn(wb(w2, w1)), wn(wb(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wn(wb(w2, w1)), wn(wb(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wb(w2, w1), wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(wo(wn(w1), w2), wn(wb(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wb(w2, w1), wb(w1, w2))

comment: A Tseitin axiom for logical biimplication, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-Mar-2018.)
